thread.title: Relatives of murdered British backpacker Grace Millane ‘honoured’ by OBEs
thread.title_full: Relatives of murdered British backpacker Grace Millane ‘honoured’ by OBEs

author: @InvCourier
title: Relatives of murdered British backpacker Grace Millane ‘honoured’ by OBEs
text: Relatives of murdered British backpacker Grace Millane ‘honoured’ by OBEs Published: 23:25, 29 December 2023 | Updated: 23:31, 29 December 2023 Easier access to your trusted, local news. Subscribe to a digital package and support local news publishing. Two relatives of murdered British backpacker Grace Millane have said they are honoured that their work to help abuse victims as a positive legacy in her name has been recognised in the New Year Honours list.
